import React from "react"; import Aux from "react-aux"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import $ from "jquery" const search = (props) => { function showSearchBar() { $(".search-container").addClass("active") } return (
$(".search-container").css("border-bottom", "1.5px solid #000000")} type="text" placeholder="Search...." />
{$(".search-container__input").val("")}}>
); }; export default search;
